tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  permission_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE permission_roles (
  role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  role_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE participant_roles (
  participant_id INT,
  role_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (participant_id, role_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES permission_roles(role_id)
)
